isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - REMOVE - CAB DOOR CHECK LINK

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Check Link on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove front cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL . If front cab door is equipped with electric windows and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Windows and Locks. If front cab door is equipped with manual windows and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.

Remove front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For removing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 50 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two hex nuts (Item 1) and remove the front cab door check link (Item 2) from the front cab door (Item 3), driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 50. Front Cab Door Check Link

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side front cab door check link.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Door Check Link on Crew Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove rear cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL . If crew cab rear door is equipped with electric windows and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Windows and Locks. If crew cab rear door is equipped with manual windows and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.

Remove crew cab rear door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For removing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for all Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 51 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two hex nuts (Item 1) and remove the crew cab rear door check link (Item 2) from the crew cab rear door (Item 3), driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 51. Crew Cab Rear Door Check Link

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. CREW CAB REAR DOOR CHECK LINK

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side crew cab rear door check link.
